item.title: About
item.description: When I’m not in class, I enjoy exploring new free (as in freedom) and open-source software and learning about open-source tech. I love writing code that’s both simple and safe. Desktop Setup Operating System: Arch Linux Btw! Password Manager: KeepassXC Window Manager: Hyprland Web-Browser: Librewolf Terminal: foot Editor: Neovim Shell: Zsh

item.title: Projects
item.description: Bibles - In a Bunch of Formats While learning and searching for something minimal, I came across Groff, short for GNU-troff, which is a typesetting system used for formatting and processing documents. I used the Mom macros to create some glorious bible PDFs, at the Github repo Bibles. mpv-copyStuff mpv-copyStuff is a script for the mpv media player software. This script provides a way to copy video specific stuff to the system clipboard, like:
